animhub.title: Animhub
animhub.description: An online platform for users to create and share animating components using HTML, CSS and JS
animhub.longDescription: This project was developed keeping in mind a platform for users to create animating components, see their live preview, share with people, follow each other on the platform. Basically is is the social media for animating components
keyFeatures: Follow and like each others components
challenges: Storing the user code into the database and retrieving it
Creating a responsive design for all devices

litgit.title: Litgit
litgit.description: An platform for teachers to see, track and analyse their student's leetcode profile
litgit.longDescription: Litgit is a solution for the teachers who wanted to track and analyse their student's leetcode profiles. As a college project we delivered a dashboard for the teachers that will fetch the publicaly available data of their students, display the stats, compare various students and create leaderboards
keyFeatures: Leaderboard ranking based on students profiles
Analysis of the students in the batch
challenges: Finding the correct leetcode API endpoints
Maintaining the students data in the TG batch
Creating dashboard elements with limited data

testimonial.quote: This helped us to keep a track of the students in our batch. Good project solving the teachers problems
testimonial.author: Mrs. Pallavi Singade

webrtc.title: Phone-a-friend
webrtc.description: A simple video calling app using WebRTC
webrtc.longDescription: This was a mvp of a simple video calling app that uses WebRTC to establish a connection between 2 peers and then they can communicate without the need of a server
keyFeatures: Link generation for the video call
Establishing communication without the use of a server
Updates such as friend joined, and friend left
challenges: Understanding about ICE-Candidates STUN/TURN servers etc
Passing the information to the other user without the use of server

predators.title: Team Predators Racing
predators.description: Online showcase for the Team Predators Racing club of DYPCOE
challenges: Using the 3D model in the website
Optimizing image, models loading for performance
Creating a responsive design for all devices
